contentencoded:
This final note on Thanksgiving.

You may know former Fed Chairman Paul Volcker as the guy who tamed inflation, but apparently, he cooks a mean Thanksgiving turkey.

A few holidays back, he had a Turkey cooking contest with former white house economic adviser Austan Goolsbee. We called up Goolsbee to ask about losing the contest.

Whether you are brining, frying or roasting today. Tweet us your recipe @marketplaceapm.

We are thankful that you spent a little bit of your holiday with us.
description: You may know former Fed Chairman Paul Volcker as the guy who tamed inflation, but apparently, he cooks a mean Thanksgiving turkey.

title: An economic turkey throwdown
